title: Node Cluster Declaration
description: Defines an OV Cluster's structure, governance, and node configuration.

id.description: The DID of the OV Cluster.

type.description: Indicates that this is a Cluster DID declaration.

namespace.description: The DID of the namespace this cluster belongs to.

managedBy.description: DIDs of entities responsible for managing this cluster.

rules.description: A reference to governance rules stored in Ceramic or DID-Linked Resources.

disputeResolution.description: A DID reference to a dispute resolution service.

role.description: The functional role of this node.

nodes.description: List of nodes in this cluster.

verification.description: The DID of the verification service.

storage.description: The DID of the storage service.

payment.description: The DID of the payment processing service.

id.description: The id of the linked resource.

name.description: The name of the linked resource.

description.description: The description of the linked resource.

uri.description: The uri of the linked resource.

type.description: The type of resource (e.g., governance, metadata, event log).

linkedResources.description: Linked resources associated with this cluster.

nodeVerification.description: Defines how new nodes are verified.

revocationPolicy.description: Conditions under which a node or vault can be revoked from the cluster.

verificationPolicies.description: Verification and security policies for the cluster.

timestamp.description: Timestamp of when this cluster declaration was issued.
